 2008-18862008-12-11JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Human Rights Act
PrecisReappointment of J. GRANT SINCLAIR, Q.C., of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, effective January 1, 2009.
